variables.name: Income
variables.description: Total taxable income for British Columbia 2025 tax calculation.

variables.name: Bracket_1
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 1: 5.06% on the portion of income up to $49,279. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_2
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 2: 7.7% on the portion of income over $49,279 up to $98,560. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_3
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 3: 10.5% on the portion of income over $98,560 up to $113,158. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_4
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 4: 12.29% on the portion of income over $113,158 up to $137,407. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_5
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 5: 14.7% on the portion of income over $137,407 up to $186,306. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_6
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 6: 16.8% on the portion of income over $186,306 up to $259,829. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_7
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 7: 20.5% on the portion of income above $259,829. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: FinalTaxes
variables.description: Sum of Bracket_1 through Bracket_7 in numerical order. Includes zeros from brackets that do not apply. Calculation must always add all seven brackets explicitly.

rules.translation: FinalTaxes is greater or equal to 0
